Pylibsass Changes
=================

Version 0.1.3
-------------

Released June 26, 2013 (bug fix release)

- Fix loading of compiled .so file so it can actually be used when installed
  from PyPi
- Add error message printing
- Revert to libsass revision 906a9a1

Version 0.1
-----------

Released June 23, 2013

- Initial release
